very rough, but seems working

#!/usr/bin/env ruby                                   
   
require 'rubygems'
require 'base32'
cmd = IO.popen("openssl sha1 #{ARGV[0]}")
puts Base32.encode( cmd.readline.split("
")[1].to_a.pack("H*") )
